verses.verse: Give ear <S%H238><s%>, ye heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%>; And let the earth <S%H776><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

My doctrine <S%H3948><s%> shall drop <S%H6201><s%> as the rain <S%H4306><s%>; My speech <S%H565><s%> shall distil <S%H5140><s%> as the dew <S%H2919><s%>, As the small rain <S%H8164><s%> upon the tender grass <S%H1877><s%>, And as the showers <S%H7241><s%> upon the herb <S%H6212><s%>.
For I will proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> ye greatness <S%H1433><s%> unto our God <S%H430><s%>.

The Rock <S%H6697><s%>, his work <S%H6467><s%> is perfect <S%H8549><s%>; For all his ways <S%H1870><s%> are justice <S%H4941><s%>: A God <S%H410><s%> of faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and without iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, Just <S%H6662><s%> and right is he <S%H3477><s%>.

They have dealt corruptly <S%H7843><s%> with him <S%H3971><s%>, they are not his children <S%H1121><s%>, it is their blemish <S%H6141><s%>; They are a perverse and crooked <S%H6618><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%>.

Do ye thus requite <S%H1580><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, O foolish <S%H5036><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> and unwise <S%H2450><s%>? Is not he thy father <S%H1><s%> that hath bought <S%H7069><s%> thee <S%H6213><s%>? He hath made thee <S%H3559><s%>, and established thee.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>, Consider <S%H995><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of many <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>: Ask <S%H7592><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>, and he will show <S%H5046><s%> thee <S%H2205><s%>; Thine elders, and they will tell thee <S%H559><s%>.

When the Most High <S%H5945><s%> gave <S%H5157><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> their inheritance <S%H5157><s%>, When he separated <S%H6504><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, He set <S%H5324><s%> the bounds <S%H1367><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> According to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s portion <S%H2506><s%> is his people <S%H5971><s%>; Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is the lot <S%H2256><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

He found <S%H4672><s%> him in a desert <S%H4057><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, And in the waste <S%H8414><s%> howling <S%H3214><s%> wilderness <S%H3452><s%>; He compassed him about <S%H5437><s%>, he cared <S%H995><s%> for him <S%H5341><s%>, He kept him as the apple <S%H380><s%> of his eye <S%H5869><s%>.

As an eagle <S%H5404><s%> that stirreth up <S%H5782><s%> her nest <S%H7064><s%>, That fluttereth <S%H7363><s%> over her young <S%H1469><s%>, He spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> his wings <S%H3671><s%>, he took <S%H3947><s%> them <S%H5375><s%>, He bare them on his pinions <S%H84><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> alone <S%H910><s%> did lead <S%H5148><s%> him <S%H5236><s%>, And there was no foreign god with him <S%H410><s%>.

He made him ride <S%H7392><s%> on the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, And he did eat <S%H398><s%> the increase <S%H8570><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>; And he made him to suck <S%H3243><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> out of the rock <S%H5553><s%>, And oil <S%H8081><s%> out of the flinty <S%H2496><s%> rock <S%H6697><s%>;

Butter <S%H2529><s%> of the herd <S%H1241><s%>, and milk <S%H2461><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%>, With fat <S%H2459><s%> of lambs <S%H3733><s%>, And rams <S%H352><s%> of the breed <S%H1121><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and goats <S%H6260><s%>, With the <S%H2459><s%> finest <S%H3629><s%> of the wheat <S%H2406><s%>; And of the <S%H2561><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> of the grape <S%H6025><s%> thou drankest wine <S%H8354><s%>.

But Jeshurun <S%H3484><s%> waxed fat <S%H8080><s%>, and kicked <S%H1163><s%>: Thou art waxed fat <S%H8080><s%>, thou art grown thick <S%H5666><s%>, thou art become sleek <S%H3780><s%>; Then he forsook <S%H5203><s%> God <S%H433><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> him <S%H5034><s%>, And lightly esteemed the Rock <S%H6697><s%> of his salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
They moved him to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with strange <S%H2114><s%> gods <S%H8441><s%>; With abominations provoked they him to anger <S%H3707><s%>.

They sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> unto demons <S%H7700><s%>, which were no God <S%H433><s%>, To gods <S%H433><s%> that they knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H2319><s%>, To new gods that came <S%H935><s%> up <S%H935><s%> of late <S%H7138><s%>, Which your fathers <S%H1><s%> dreaded not <S%H8175><s%>.
Of the Rock <S%H6697><s%> that begat <S%H3205><s%> thee thou art unmindful <S%H7876><s%>, And hast forgotten <S%H7911><s%> God <S%H410><s%> that gave thee birth <S%H2342><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5006><s%>, and abhorred them <S%H3708><s%>, Because of the provocation of his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, I will hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from them <S%H7200><s%>, I will see what their end <S%H319><s%> shall be <S%H8419><s%>: For they are a very perverse generation <S%H1755><s%>, Children <S%H1121><s%> in whom is no faithfulness <S%H529><s%>.

They have moved me to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with that which is not <S%H3808><s%> God <S%H410><s%>; They have provoked me to anger <S%H3707><s%> with their vanities <S%H1892><s%>: And I will move them to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with those that are not a people <S%H5971><s%>; I will provoke them to anger <S%H3707><s%> with a foolish <S%H5036><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>.

For a fire <S%H784><s%> is kindled <S%H6919><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, And burneth <S%H3344><s%> unto the lowest <S%H8482><s%> Sheol <S%H7585><s%>, And devoureth <S%H398><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with its increase <S%H2981><s%>, And setteth on fire <S%H3857><s%> the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.
I will heap <S%H5595><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> upon them <S%H3615><s%>; I will spend mine arrows upon them <S%H2671><s%>:

They shall be wasted <S%H4198><s%> with hunger <S%H7458><s%>, and devoured <S%H3898><s%> with burning heat <S%H7565><s%> And bitter <S%H4815><s%> destruction <S%H6986><s%>; And the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of beasts <S%H929><s%> will I send <S%H7971><s%> upon them <S%H2534><s%>, With the poison of crawling <S%H2119><s%> things of the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

Without <S%H2351><s%> shall the sword <S%H2719><s%> bereave <S%H2315><s%>, And in the chambers terror <S%H367><s%>; It shall destroy <S%H7921><s%> both young man <S%H970><s%> and virgin <S%H1330><s%>, The suckling <S%H3243><s%> with the man <S%H376><s%> of gray hairs <S%H7872><s%>.
I said <S%H559><s%>, I would scatter them afar <S%H6284><s%>, I would make the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of them to cease <S%H7673><s%> from among men <S%H582><s%>;

Were it not <S%H3884><s%> that I feared <S%H1481><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>, Lest their adversaries <S%H6862><s%> should judge amiss <S%H5234><s%>, Lest they should say <S%H559><s%>, Our hand <S%H3027><s%> is exalted <S%H7311><s%>, And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not done all this <S%H6466><s%>.
For they are a nation <S%H1471><s%> void <S%H6><s%> of counsel <S%H6098><s%>, And there is no understanding in them <S%H8394><s%>.
Oh that <S%H3863><s%> they were wise <S%H2449><s%>, that they understood <S%H7919><s%> this <S%H995><s%>, That they would consider their latter end <S%H319><s%>!

How should one <S%H259><s%> chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>, And two <S%H8147><s%> put ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> to flight <S%H5127><s%>, Except <S%H3808><s%> their Rock <S%H6697><s%> had sold <S%H4376><s%> them <S%H3588><s%>, And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had delivered them up <S%H5462><s%>?
For their rock <S%H6697><s%> is not as our Rock <S%H6697><s%>, Even our enemies <S%H341><s%> themselves being judges <S%H6414><s%>.

For their vine <S%H1612><s%> is of the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, And of the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>: Their grapes <S%H6025><s%> are grapes <S%H6025><s%> of gall <S%H7219><s%>, Their clusters <S%H811><s%> are bitter <S%H4846><s%>:
Their wine <S%H3196><s%> is the poison <S%H2534><s%> of serpents <S%H8577><s%>, And the cruel <S%H393><s%> venom <S%H7219><s%> of asps <S%H6620><s%>.
Is not this laid up in store <S%H3647><s%> with me <S%H2856><s%>, Sealed up among my treasures <S%H214><s%>?

Vengeance <S%H5359><s%> is mine <S%H8005><s%>, and recompense, At the time <S%H6256><s%> when their foot <S%H7272><s%> shall slide <S%H4131><s%>: For the day <S%H3117><s%> of their calamity <S%H343><s%> is at hand <S%H7138><s%>, And the things that are to come <S%H6264><s%> upon them shall make haste <S%H2363><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, And repent <S%H5162><s%> himself for his servants <S%H5650><s%>; When he seeth <S%H7200><s%> that their power <S%H3027><s%> is gone <S%H235><s%>, And there is none <S%H657><s%> remaining <S%H6113><s%>, shut up or left at large <S%H5800><s%>.
And he will say <S%H559><s%>, Where are their gods <S%H430><s%>, The rock <S%H6697><s%> in which they took refuge <S%H2620><s%>;

Which did eat <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, And drank <S%H8354><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of their drink-offering <S%H5257><s%>? Let them rise up <S%H6965><s%> and help <S%H5826><s%> you <S%H5643><s%>, Let them be your protection.

See <S%H7200><s%> now that I <S%H430><s%>, even I, am he, And there is no god with me <S%H4191><s%>: I kill, and I make alive <S%H2421><s%>; I wound <S%H4272><s%>, and I heal <S%H7495><s%>; And there is none that can deliver <S%H5337><s%> out of my hand <S%H3027><s%>.
For I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, And say <S%H559><s%>, As I live <S%H2416><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>,

If I whet <S%H8150><s%> my glittering <S%H1300><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>, And my hand <S%H3027><s%> take hold <S%H270><s%> on judgment <S%H4941><s%>; I will render <S%H7725><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> to mine adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, And will recompense <S%H7999><s%> them that hate me <S%H8130><s%>.

I will make mine arrows <S%H2671><s%> drunk <S%H7937><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>, And my sword <S%H2719><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>; With the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%> and the captives <S%H7633><s%>, From the head <S%H7218><s%> of the leaders <S%H6546><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%>.

Rejoice <S%H7442><s%>, O ye nations <S%H1471><s%>, with his people <S%H5971><s%>: For he will avenge <S%H5358><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>, And will render <S%H7725><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> to his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, And will make expiation <S%H3722><s%> for his land <S%H127><s%>, for his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spake <S%H1696><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this song <S%H7892><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, he <S%H1954><s%>, and Hoshea the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%> to all Israel <S%H3478><s%>;

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7760><s%>, Set your heart <S%H3824><s%> unto all the words <S%H1697><s%> which I testify <S%H5749><s%> unto you this day <S%H3117><s%>, which ye shall command <S%H6680><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%>, even all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%>.

For it is no vain <S%H7386><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> for you <S%H2416><s%>; because it is your life, and through this thing <S%H1697><s%> ye shall prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%>, whither ye go over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> that selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Get thee up <S%H5927><s%> into this mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim <S%H5682><s%>, unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Nebo <S%H5015><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, that is over against <S%H6440><s%> Jericho <S%H3405><s%>; and behold <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, which I give <S%H5414><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%>;

and die <S%H4191><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> whither thou goest up <S%H5927><s%>, and be gathered <S%H622><s%> unto thy people <S%H5971><s%>, as Aaron <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, and was gathered <S%H622><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>:

because ye trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah of Kadesh <S%H4808><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%>; because ye sanctified <S%H6942><s%> me not in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before thee <S%H935><s%>; but thou shalt not go thither into the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
